headline: Why Are Citi and Morgan Stanley Turning Strongly Positive on M&M?
synthesis: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.

timeline.text: Good evening — here’s what’s moving markets.
Bigger picture: This ties into broader market movement and sentiment.. Risk profile here is shifting but not extreme.
Turning to the latest shifts in market sentiment, Citi and Morgan Stanley have recently adopted a strongly positive outlook on M&M.
